nodes.text: The Black Hole Gang was a crew of pirates that oper	ated out of the Delphon system and terrorized the shipping lanes of the Anoat sector. Originally founded and led by the Corellian Hethra Mcgrrrr as the Mcgrrrr Gang, the crew frequently changed leadership due to violent disagreements between its members. Whenever the gang fell on hard times, however, ex-captain Mcgrrrr reappeared to help reorganize the crew before returning to semiretirement.

At one point during the height of the Galactic Empire, the Black Hole Gang was led by a Pantoran named Cru Devilar, who employed a number of Trandoshan goons. Cage, a Mikkian tech-monger from Delphon City, had ties to the gang.

During the Empire's Iron Blockade, whenever the criminal Trade Spine League wanted to move a shipment of crystals quietly from the planet Burnin Konn to the planet Delphon, they had to first deal with the Black Hole Gang.
